text: penkar prahlad kæ mnusʹy hrux thi rea di hı wa hiyˌ kæ chay khn hnung cak phwk khea hı teuxn sathab mnusʹy læa cæng khawdi kæ brrda phu sraththa wa thæcring sahrab phwk khea nan ca di rab tahænng xan sungsng n thi phracea khxng khea brrda phu ptiseth sraththa klaw wa thæcring ni khux nak mayakl xyang nænxn
